Detailed Description

Structure to hold a 4x4 matrix, in openGL format.

Note:
Matrix::m_data in OpenGL format :
|x0 y0 z0 0|
|x1 y1 z1 0|
|x2 y2 z2 0|
|tx ty tz 1|

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Real  y0 = 0,
Real  z0 = 0,
Real  w0 = 0,
Real  x1 = 0,
Real  y1 = 1,
Real  z1 = 0,
Real  w1 = 0,
Real  x2 = 0,
Real  y2 = 0,
Real  z2 = 1,
Real  w2 = 0,
Real  tx = 0,
Real  ty = 0,
Real  tz = 0,
Real  tw = 1 
)

Default constructor taking initial values for individual matrix elements.
In format :

|x0 y0 z0 w0|
|x1 y1 z1 w1|
|x2 y2 z2 w2|
|tx ty tz tw|
Note:
default value is the identity matrix
See also:
Identity()

Quaternion chain::Matrix::ToQuat (  )  const

Get the quaternion rotation of this matrix.

Convert the rotation components of this matrix into a quaternion rotation

const Matrix & chain::Matrix::Transpose (  ) 

Transpose this matrix.

Reflect matrix by its main diagonal, top left to bottom right.

|01 02 03 04| ---> |01 05 09 13|
|05 06 07 08| ---> |02 06 10 14|
|09 10 11 12| ---> |03 07 11 15|
|13 14 15 16| ---> |04 08 12 16|
Returns:
const Matrix& - the transposed matrix
